"Landstrider Legion Jaunt to The Dot" Just Announced!

Landstrider Legion is proud to announce it's latest expedition "The Landstrider Legion Jaunt to The Dot!"
This is a week long glorious trip to three beautiful sights in the east of the galaxy. Our trip will follow an easy and accessible route to our main attractions, stopping once a day to rest and have a little fun.
We will leave on the 7th of November, and be back on the 14th, making three major stops:

  • Hawkings Dream on Nov. 9th 3307
  • The Grie Hypai Anomaly on Nov. 10th 3307
  • Hawkings Dream on Nov, 11th 3307
